channel.title: SFoL 22.5: Siege on Xed (End) - Revenant Unfortunately Wins with Alchemist
channel.description:
# [color=#73b893]W[/color][color=#72b694]e[/color][color=#71b595]l[/color][color=#70b396]c[/color][color=#6fb197]o[/color][color=#6eb098]m[/color][color=#6dae99]e[/color] [color=#6baa9b]t[/color][color=#6aa99c]o[/color] [color=#68a59e]S[/color][color=#67a49f]i[/color][color=#66a2a0]e[/color][color=#65a0a1]g[/color][color=#649fa2]e[/color] [color=#629ba4]o[/color][color=#6199a5]n[/color] [color=#5f96a7]X[/color][color=#5e94a8]e[/color][color=#5d93a9]d[/color] [color=#5b8fab]S[/color][color=#5a8eac]F[/color][color=#598cad]o[/color][color=#588aae]L[/color]
## [color=#73b893]I[/color] [color=#72b694]h[/color][color=#71b595]o[/color][color=#71b495]p[/color][color=#70b396]e[/color] [color=#6fb197]y[/color][color=#6eb098]o[/color][color=#6eaf98]u[/color] [color=#6dad99]e[/color][color=#6cac9a]n[/color][color=#6bab9b]j[/color][color=#6baa9b]o[/color][color=#6aa99c]y[/color] [color=#69a79d]t[/color][color=#69a69d]h[/color][color=#68a59e]e[/color] [color=#67a39f]s[/color][color=#66a2a0]t[/color][color=#66a1a0]a[/color][color=#65a0a1]y[/color] [color=#649ea2]o[/color][color=#639da3]n[/color] [color=#629ca4]o[/color][color=#629ba4]u[/color][color=#619aa5]r[/color] [color=#6098a6]p[/color][color=#5f97a7]i[/color][color=#5f96a7]r[/color][color=#5e95a8]a[/color][color=#5e94a8]t[/color][color=#5d93a9]e[/color] [color=#5c91aa]s[/color][color=#5b90ab]h[/color][color=#5b8fab]i[/color][color=#5a8eac]p[/color] [color=#598cad]k[/color][color=#588bae]n[/color][color=#588aae]o[/color][color=#5789af]w[/color][color=#5788af]n[/color] [color=#5586b1]a[/color][color=#5585b1]s[/color] [color=#5483b2]X[/color][color=#5382b3]e[/color][color=#5381b3]d[/color][color=#5280b4].[/color]
# [color=#73b893]H[/color][color=#71b495]o[/color][color=#6fb098]s[/color][color=#6cac9a]t[/color][color=#6aa99c]e[/color][color=#68a59e]d[/color] [color=#639da3]b[/color][color=#6199a5]y[/color] [color=#5d92aa]P[/color][color=#5a8eac]u[/color][color=#588aae]g[/color]
## [color=#73b893]C[/color][color=#72b794]o[/color][color=#72b694]-[/color][color=#71b595]h[/color][color=#70b496]o[/color][color=#70b396]s[/color][color=#6fb197]t[/color][color=#6fb097]e[/color][color=#6eaf98]d[/color] [color=#6dad99]b[/color][color=#6cac9a]y[/color] [color=#6baa9b]t[/color][color=#6aa99c]h[/color][color=#69a89d]e[/color] [color=#68a59e]D[/color][color=#67a49f]u[/color][color=#67a39f]r[/color][color=#66a2a0]i[/color][color=#66a1a0]a[/color][color=#65a0a1]n[/color] [color=#649ea2]h[/color][color=#639da3]e[/color][color=#629ca4]r[/color][color=#629aa4]s[/color][color=#6199a5]e[/color][color=#6098a6]l[/color][color=#6097a6]f[/color] [color=#5e95a8]a[/color][color=#5e94a8]n[/color][color=#5d93a9]d[/color] :b:[color=#5c91aa]n[/color][color=#5b8fab]s[/color][color=#5b8eab]a[/color][color=#5a8dac]n[/color][color=#598cad]i[/color][color=#598bad]t[/color][color=#588aae]y[/color]
### Rules
https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-official-hub/1515
### Gameplay Days will be 4 IRL days long, or shorter if someone dies Nights will be 2 IRL days long Actions are done by DMing me through Discord Bard will be able to talk to the dead through Quicktopic. Any linked players will also get a link to the Quicktopic so they can interact with Dead Chat and Bard as well. All classes will be used, and will be used as they are found in my [Class Cards Thread](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/gamemode-idea-siege-on-the-xed-2-1-0-sfol-exclusive-content/50889) When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it
### Executions To accuse someone say "**!accuse [player]**" or "**!vote [player]**" When someone is on Trial they will be able to post a 1000 character defense on the post, during this time no-one should post, everyone will then vote Guilty or innocent by voting on the poll. After the votes are revealed, the King has 24 hours to choose to allow or veto the vote, if the king does not respond the vote is decided by the other players. Executions end the Day
### After The Night You will be told what happened to you
### Journals Message me your entire journal, the last draft I receive before you die shall be the one displayed
### To Join To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
### Plunders: Plunders are a special occasion that happens every 2-3 days ingame unless one is forced to happen. In this time, all players will vote up one player to go plundering. This player will gain a special ability. A player can only plunder once in a game.
### Rolelist: **Captain** **[color=purple]Mastermind[/color]/[color=darkred]Cult Leader[/color]** **[color=purple]Assassin[/color]/[color=darkred]Random Cult[/color]** **[color=51CD46]First Mate[/color]** **[color=51CD46]Private Investigator/Stealthy[/color]** **[color=51CD46]Scientist[/color]** **[color=51CD46]Green Kraken Investigative[/color]** **[color=51CD46]Random Green Kraken[/color]** **[color=51CD46]Random Green Kraken[/color]** **[color=51CD46]Random Green Kraken[/color]** **[color=51CD46]Random Green Kraken[/color]** **[color=51CD46]Random Green Kraken[/color]** **[color=51CD46]Random Green Kraken[/color]** **[color=51CD46]Random Green Kraken[/color]** **[color=51CD46]Random Green Kraken[/color]** **/** **[color=grey]Neutral Non-Killer[/color]** **[color=grey]Neutral Killer[/color]** **[color=grey]Neutral Non-Killer[/color]**
Players: 1. Marluxion - [color=51CD46]The Quarter Master[/color] 5. IdiotPrime - [color=darkgreen]The Alchemist[/color] 9. PoisonedSquid - [color=51CD46]The Treasure Keeper[/color] 10. NuclearBurrito - [color=51CD46]The Deck Hand[/color] 13. Sam17z - [color=darkred]The Devout Captain[/color] 17. eevee - [color=51CD46]The Bard[/color]
**Graveyard:** PKR - **Died Night 1 - [color=51CD46]The Gunslinger[/color]** Whammerist - **Died Night 1 - [color=lightgrey]The Spiritualist[/color]** techwolves - **Executed Day 2 - [color=darkred]The Cult Leader[/color]** Boss110 - **Executed Day 3 - [color=darkred]The Cult Leader[/color]** Parfait - **Killed Night 3 - [color=51CD46]The Stealthy[/color]** Firekitten - **Executed Day 4 - [color=51CD46]The Sailor[/color]** Strangle - **Died Night 4 - [color=51CD46]The Scientist[/color]** PolikShadowbliss - **Died Night 4 - [color=688E23]The Mercenary[/color]** Memesky - **Executed Day 5 - [color=51CD46]The First Mate[/color]** Frostwolf103 - **Died Night 5 - [color=51CD46]The Gunslinger[/color]** Celeste_Ludenberg - **Died Night 5 - [color=51CD46]The Plunder Organiser[/color]**
**Backups:**
1. 2. 3. 4.
**Spectators:** Twil1ight Wolfy
**Timestamps:** [Day 2 - A Moderror, a dead Gunslinger and a Spook](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-22-5-siege-on-xed-day-2-a-moderror-a-dead-gunslinger-and-a-spooky-ghost/61316/125?u=pug) [Night 2 - On Xed. Mithras cannot save you.](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-22-5-siege-on-xed-day-2-a-moderror-a-dead-gunslinger-and-a-spook/61316/1272?u=pug) [Day 3 - Xedding Over It with Pug Foddy](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-22-5-siege-on-xed-day-3-memeskys-quest-to-return-to-a-haunted-ship/61316/1297?u=pug) [Night 3 - It's Wult Season](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-22-5-siege-on-xed-night-3-its-wult-season-13-17/61316/2412?u=pug) [Night 4 - Oh Great. Now There's A Spare Boat](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-22-5-siege-on-xed-night-4-oh-great-now-theres-a-spare-boat-11-17/61316/2799?u=pug) [Day 5 - Technological Malfunction and Work is Tough](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-22-5-siege-on-xed-night-4-oh-great-now-theres-a-spare-boat-11-17/61316/2807?u=pug) [Day 6 - Everybody Hates Plunders](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-22-5-siege-on-xed-day-6-everybody-hates-plunders-6-17/61316/3187?u=pug)

item.dc:creator: MaximusPrime
item.description:
This was from SFol 22.5

Aka the “revenant is a thing” game

Why did you bring it back .-.

Edit: was on mobile so didn’t read thread title. I thought you pit this in the best/worst forum wuotes thread again -_-

Read full topic

item.title: SFoL 22.5: Siege on Xed (End) - Revenant Unfortunately Wins with Alchemist
item.dc:creator: Whammerist
item.description:
i mean i was confirmed scum and i had no reason to present a facade of reads or really anything at all
there is no reason to me to fake town motivation when it’s confirmed i’m not town and town cannot do anything about it
if you think that’s my fault you just have no understanding of this game haha
